txt_en: New year, new chapter.
Love is what binds us, through fair or stormy weather.
txt_cn: 爱将我们紧紧相连，让我们共度风雨。

txt_en: I hope you have the strength to start all over again.
The first blooms of spring always make my heart sing.
txt_cn: 看见春天的第一朵花，我的心都开始歌唱。

txt_en: Pretty things should be enjoyed.
Learn to like the little things in life.
txt_cn: 学会感受生活中的点滴欢愉。

txt_en: There is always a chance that things'll get better.
There is always something more to learn.
This path has been placed before you.
Don't you stop running and don't you ever look behind you.
We are the composers of our own epic poem.
txt_cn: 人生的史诗由自己书写。

txt_en: Sometimes affection is a shy flower that takes time to blossom.
txt_cn: 有时感情犹如含羞的花，需要时间缓缓绽放。

txt_en: Only one thing can make a soul complete, and that thing is love.
Love is the best thing we do.
May every color of love fill your heart on the auspicious Lantern Festival.
txt_cn: 元宵佳节至，愿您内心爱意丰盈。

txt_en: There are some natures too noble to curb, and too lofty to bend.
txt_cn: 有的人生来高尚，从不低头。

txt_en: You decide what makes you happy.
Don't make promises you can't keep.
I wish we could stay friends.
I want you to be the very best version of yourself that you can be.
We only know what we're capable of when we test our limits.
txt_cn: 尽力一试才知道自己的能耐。

txt_en: Nobody's a hundred percent of any one thing.
Everything's gonna work out exactly the way it's supposed to be.
Life will always undervalue you if you let it.
txt_cn: 敷衍人生，人生也会敷衍你。
